title: #062 - How to Create a Successful Membership Site with Stu McLaren
itunes:title: #062 - How to Create a Successful Membership Site with Stu McLaren
description: In today's episode, I welcome Stu McLaren, membership website expert and business owner. Stu shares his experience balancing his responsibilities of being an entrepreneur and a family man. He talks about the lessons he's learned as he started and grew his business, WishList Member, the world’s largest membership platform for Wordpress, and his Tribe training program that teaches entrepreneurs about successful membership sites. If you're looking at starting your own membership site, this episode is for you. Enjoy!
